entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning in the afternoon then changing to flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon.
